data.title: The Migrant Kitchen Initiative in New York, NY
data.meta_description: We work with Brand Partners to develop mutually-beneficial fundraising campaigns, merchandise, media, and experiences that have an incredible impact.
data.meta_site_name: The Migrant Kitchen Initiative | Impact-driven food services company
data.text:
Interested In Getting Your Brand Involved?

Our most successful partnerships span a multi-year life cycle and involve a number of different tactics. Here are a handful of ways your brand can partner with The Migrant Kitchen Initiative.

GIVE - Contribute to food projects, operations, or the tools that make our work possible.

Corporate Gift, Percentage of Sale, Round-Up, Matching, Gifts in Kind

ENGAGE - Rally your employees and customers to fundraise and support your philanthropic efforts.

Employee Fundraising, Customer Fundraising, Community Outreach, Volunteer Opportunities

AMPLIFY - Help shine a spotlight on the hunger crisis or food insecurity and the impact of our work.

Media Support and Inventory, Gifted Social Media, Event Integration
